source: You can store ammunition for ranged weapons here.
You can equip backpacks, shield, or strap large weapons here.
You can equip belts or girdles here.
You can store any object here.
You can wear boots, slippers, or shoes in this slot.
You can equip gloves or gauntlets here.
You can equip hats, helms, crowns, or diadems here.
You can equip main weapons here.
You can equip necklaces and amulets here.
You can equip secondary weapons here. If the main hand is already equipped with a two-handed weapon, this slot is disabled.
You can store objects in your backpack, etc., as long as you do not exceed the maximum weight of the container.
You can store small objects here.
You can only place torches or equivalent items here.
You can equip suits of armor here.
You can store utility items (potions, scrolls, spell focus, component pouch) here.
You can equip cloaks and pauldrons here.
